title: U.S. can become a crypto superpower with 'sensible' regulation, Eric Trump says
content: Speaking to CNBC's Dan Murphy in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates, Eric Trump said Monday that he'd been a "big fan of crypto for a long time."

title: From Trump and Turkey, to Russia and Iran — Syria's regime change has huge global consequences

title: Nvidia shares fall after China opens investigation over possible violation of antimonopoly law

title: Brian Thompson killing: Man questioned in Pennsylvania in UnitedHealthcare CEO slaying

title: Ex-Dodge, Ram boss Tim Kuniskis returning to Stellantis after CEO's exit

title: India appoints Revenue Secretary Sanjay Malhotra as new central bank governor
content: India has appointed Sanjay Malhotra as governor of the country's central bank for a three-year period, according to CNBC TV18.

title: From failed accountant to Marvel and Barbie star: Simu Liu shares how he got out of 'rock bottom'
content: Actor Simu Liu was fired from Deloitte before becoming an actor. He's now investing in Asian American businesses and is outspoken about tackling discrimination.

title: He bought a KFC store in Australia for $100,000 in 1969. Today, his fast food company is worth over $3 billion

title: China vows 'more proactive' fiscal stimulus measures, 'moderately' looser monetary policy

title: UK business confidence falls to lowest level in almost two years after Labour budget
content: British businesses lost steam and pulled back on hiring last month, as industry reacted to the Labour government's bumper tax-raising budget, new data showed Monday.
summary: British businesses lost steam and pulled back on hiring last month, as industry reacted to the Labour government's bumper tax-raising budget, new data showed Monday.

title: China consumer inflation rate drops to a five-month low, missing expectations as economy slows
content: China's consumer prices rose less-than-expected in November, climbing 0.2% from a year ago, according to data from the National Bureau of Statistics released Monday.
summary: China's consumer prices rose less-than-expected in November, climbing 0.2% from a year ago, according to data from the National Bureau of Statistics released Monday.

title: McDonald's fired Pharrell Williams 3 times—and then he created its famous jingle 'I'm loving it'

title: Google CEO: AI development is finally slowing down—'the low-hanging fruit is gone’

title: South Korea's President Yoon survives impeachment motion after ruling party boycotts vote

title: The weight-loss drug boom has become one of the internet's biggest scams
